name: Wired (itch) (Mrneo240)
description:
2D platformer based on the Wikipedia game of finding links between pages

Written for a GSU Fall 2020 CSC-4821/6821 - Fundamentals of Game Design Final Project.

Team Members: Hayden Kowalchuk and Emily Goltz

More information available here: http://gamedev.cs.gsu.edu/~hkowalchuk1/project.html

Note: Looks best when ran in fullscreen at 1920x1080 resolution.
